titleStmt.title: A True relation of the transaction of the commands of both Houses of Parliament in the execution of the militia in the county of Leichester by the Right Honourable Henry Earle of Stamford, lord lieutenant of the said county, the honourable the Lord Ruthen, Sir Arthur Haselrigge Knight, deputy lieutenants, and others subservient to the same commands performed in the towne and county of Leichester aforesaid, before and upon Wednesday the two and twentieth of June 1642 : with the votes of both Houses of Parliament, dissanuling His Majesties illegall Commission of Aray.
titleStmt.author: Chambers, John, 17th cent.
Stanforth, James, 17th cent.

notesStmt.note: "A narration of the service performed ..." signed at end: John Chambers, James Stanforth.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
